answers.answer: Hi,He has to defenitely see a doctor, losing 29 pounds with out any specific reason implies some serious health issue, possibly diabetes, or may be some other disease.Solace
Without knowing even your husband's age it is impossible to give an opinion here. Your husband needs a few tests and get this sorted out. It may or may not be serious.

question: Myhusnabd has lost 29 lbs in three wks and is always urinating and dizzy what is it he wont take off work to go to the dr we cant afford it so is it serious
title: mens health
